service.name: Facials

seo.title: Facials in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Custom facials for every skin type—dermaplane included. Deep cleanse, exfoliation, and glow with zero downtime. Book Westfield or Carmel.

overview.p1: Our custom facials include dermaplane to whisk away dull surface cells for instant smoothness and glow.
overview.p2: We tailor every step—cleanse, exfoliate, treat, and nourish—so you leave dewy, balanced, and event-ready.

whyReluxe.title: Dermaplane included
whyReluxe.body: Extra-smooth finish is built in to every facial.

whyReluxe.title: Product matchmaking
whyReluxe.body: We pair pro products to your skin type and goals.

whyReluxe.title: Zero-pressure education
whyReluxe.body: Clear, simple home-care tips you’ll actually use.

service.tagline: Custom glow for every skin type. Dermaplane included.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

flexEverything.intro: Signature & Teen options. Each facial includes a dermaplane for extra-smooth results.

items.heading: Perfect for
items.body: Events, monthly maintenance, and skincare resets.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
